subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{ja-compound|ブー|ブー|太|ふと|t1=[[oink]]|t2=[[fat]] person|nocat=1}}, by its resemblance.

The kanji is from {{der|ja|zh|豚||[[suckling]] [[pig]]|sort=ふた'}}. Compare {{cog|ja|猪|tr=inoshishi||[[boar]]}} from {{cog|zh|猪||pig}} and {{cog|ja|猿|tr=saru||[[monkey]]}} from {{cog|zh|猿||[[ape]]}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ぶた|ブタ}}

# [[pig]]; [[swine]]
# {{lb|ja|colloquial|poker|sort=ふた'}} {{syn of|lang=ja|ハイカード|tr=hai kādo||[[high card]]}}; a [[no pair]]
#* {{quote-book|||{{lj|明智警視の優雅なる事件簿}}
|||{{lj|[赤](あか)[菱](びし)さんのカードは８と[Ｊ](ジャック)のツーペア‥‥[三](みつ)[矢](や)さんは[Ａ](エース)のスリーカード　[雲](くも)[間](ま)さんは[Ｑ](クイーン)のワンペア　緑川さんは'''[役なし](ブタ)'''‥‥}}
|last=Amagi
|first=Seimaru
|authorlink=Shin Kibayashi
|coauthors={{w|Fumiya Satō|Sato, Fumiya}}
|chapter={{lj|FILE 1　[殺](さつ)[人](じん)ポーカー　Unlucky Men in the Rain　〈[問](もん)[題](だい)[編](へん)〉}}
|trans-chapter=FILE 1: Murderous Poker: Unlucky Men in the Rain ‹Problem›
|trans-title=Superintendent Akechi Elegant Case Files
|genre=fiction
|lang=ja
|edition=3rd
|location=Tokyo
|publisher=Kodansha
|date=Jul 7 2000
|origdate=May 17 2000
|isbn=4-06-334303-0
|translation=Akabishi-san’s hand would have a two pair, eights and jacks‥‥ Mitsuya-san’s a three of a kind, aces. Kumoma-san’s a one pair, queens. Midorikawa-san’s a high card‥‥
|transliteration=''Akabishi-san no kādo wa hachi to jakku no tsū pea‥‥ Mitsuya-san wa ēsu no surī kādo Kumoma-san wa kuīn no wan pea Midorikawa-san wa '''buta'''‥‥''}}
